==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|てん|ばい|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
* [[音読み|On'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|/te.ɴ.ba.i/|[tẽ̞ɴbäi]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|てんばい|kyu=轉賣}}

# a [[resale]] of something previously purchased
# a [[liquidation]] [[sale]] of [[financial]] [[securities]]

====Usage notes====
Note that this is not {{m|en|retail}}: that is {{l|ja|小売|tr=''kouri''}}.

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|又売り}}, {{l|ja|又売|tr=[[またうり]], ''[[matauri]]''}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|てんばい|kyu=轉賣}}

# to [[resell]] something previously purchased
#: {{ja-usex|家を'''転売'''した。|いえ を '''てんばい''' した。|We sold the house to someone else.}}
# to [[liquidate]] [[financial]] [[securities]]

====Usage notes====
Note that this is not {{m|en|retail}}: that is {{l|ja|小売|tr=''kouri''}}.

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|てんばい}}

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|又売り}}, {{l|ja|又売|tr=[[またうり]], ''[[matauri]]''}}
